folderRestriction.name: Restrict User Data Folder?
folderRestriction.hint: Enable folder restriction in the file explorer application, this makes it so that users can only see and upload into a specific folder within User Data

notifs.disableRestriction: Folder restriction disabled because changing the bypass role to Player

goToFolder.name: Restrict To Folder
goToFolder.hint: The folder that the User Data should be restricted to, this folder needs to already exist when saving the setting

notifs.dirNotExist: Cannot set the restriction to a folder that doesn't exist

bypassFolderNavigationLock.name: Folder Restriction Bypass
bypassFolderNavigationLock.hint: Users with this permission will be able to bypass the folder restriction in the user data, and upload files wherever in the user data they want to.
